medieq.iet.components
Interface TaskManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
TaskManagerImpl
public interface TaskManager

TaskManager creates extraction Tasks, runs them in multiple threads and maintains lists of user-defined listeners. Tasks can be stopped at any time.

Method Summary
 int processTask(java.lang.String taskFile, java.util.List<Document> processedDocumentList, boolean sync)
          Same as processTask above, but fetches the task description from a file.

Method Detail

processTask

int processTask(java.lang.String taskId,
                java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> procedures,
                java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> inputDocumentList,
                java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> annotationList,
                java.lang.String dataModelUrl,
                java.util.List<Document> processedDocumentList,
                boolean sync)
                throws IETException
Creates and runs an extraction task containing the given documents and based on the specified extraction model.

Parameters:
taskId - Name of the task
inputDocumentList - list of name-value maps representing documents
annotationList - list to be filled by name-value maps representing annotations
dataModel - data model to use for all documents. If null, IET attempts to determine the appropriate model based on each document's classification. The mapping of classifications to data models is defined in IET config file.
processedDocumentList - list of medieq.iet.Document objects containing highlighted document source, extracted attribute and instance lists.
sync - whether this call should block until all documents are processed or return immediately
Returns:
task handle that uniquely identifies the running task
Throws:
IETException

processTask

int processTask(java.lang.String taskFile,
                java.util.List<Document> processedDocumentList,
                boolean sync)
                throws IETException
Same as processTask above, but fetches the task description from a file.

Throws:
IETException

stopTask

boolean stopTask(int taskHandle,
                 boolean sync)
                 throws IETException
Terminates an extraction task.

Parameters:
taskHandle - task handle returned by processTask
sync - whether this call should block until the extraction task is terminated
Returns:
true if the task was found and terminated
Throws:
IETException

stopAllTasks

boolean stopAllTasks(boolean sync)
                     throws IETException
Terminates all extraction tasks.

Parameters:
sync - whether this call should block until all extraction tasks are terminated
Returns:
true if any tasks were found and terminated
Throws:
IETException

registerListener

void registerListener(int taskHandle,
                      TaskListener taskListener)
Registers a listener which gets notified when each document's processing finishes. The listener will be called for a specific task or for any task if taskHandle==-1.

unregisterListener

void unregisterListener(TaskListener taskListener)
Unregisters a previously registered listener.

uninitialize

void uninitialize()
                  throws IETException
Terminates any running tasks and unregisters all listeners.

Throws:
IETException
